title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch – Style 98B406

Make a bold statement with precision performance. From Bulova’s Marine Star collection, this men’s 6-hand chronograph blends nautical sport design with refined gold-tone finishes for a watch that transitions effortlessly from office to open water.

Key features:
- Movement and functions: 6-hand chronograph with 24-hour display and calendar.
- Case: Gold-tone stainless steel.
- Bezel: Black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents.
- Crystal: Domed mineral crystal for enhanced clarity and durability.
- Dial: Black sunburst dial with gold-tone and silver-tone accents.
- Luminescence: Luminous hands and markers for low-light readability.
- Water resistance: 100 meters (suitable for swimming and snorkeling).
- Bracelet: Gold-tone stainless steel with curved and faceted links.
- Closure: Sport foldover clasp for secure, comfortable wear.

Why you’ll love it:
- Sport-luxe aesthetic: Contrasting black bezel and sunburst dial deliver striking depth and legibility.
- Everyday durability: Solid stainless steel construction and domed mineral crystal stand up to daily wear.
- Practical performance: Reliable chronograph timing, 24-hour indicator, and date keep you on schedule at a glance.
- Marine Star pedigree: A signature Bulova line known for maritime-inspired design and dependable water resistance.

Specifications:
- Collection: Marine Star
- Style number: 98B406
- Case material: Gold-tone stainless steel
- Water resistance: 100 m
- Functions: Chronograph, 24-hour display, calendar
- Bracelet: Gold-tone stainless steel; curved and faceted links
- Clasp: Sport foldover
- Dial: Black sunburst with gold-tone and silver-tone accents
- Lume: Hands and markers
- Crystal: Domed mineral

Elevate your wrist with a timepiece that captures the spirit of the sea and the polish of fine design. The Marine Star 98B406 is built to perform and styled to impress.
